text: carolyn summarize for us the findings in
our story today about Governor Paterson
the story today essentially says that
the governor himself directed to state
workers to reach out to this woman who
had alleged that one of his top aides
had assaulted her this was significant
because the role of the governor has
still been sort of mysterious and he
hasn't publicly offered much about what
he did so for the political world in
just a larger world that is watching the
story unfold it felt like a new and
troubling revelation and what are the
lines of reporting that you're following
today well first of all there are
already additional calls for him to
resign the National Organization for
Women which has been an ally of the
governor's put out a very strong
statement saying that he had to step
down the state Republican Party did the
same the governor himself has not been
heard from today he was supposed to
appear at a public meeting with
legislative leaders he has apparently
cancelled that appearance and said that
he's not feeling well so as far as we
know he's in the Executive Mansion and
has no plans to emerge I know you can't
predict the future but it is your is
your expectation that there will be
increasing calls for him to resign or is
there some sense that perhaps the
political power brokers in the state
will sort of allow him to have the rest
of his turn right now I mean what really
worries a lot of lawmakers and even
people who have been in the past
supportive of the governor is that every
day you're going to have more
information obviously the Attorney
General is investigating this case and
taking it quite seriously and moving
quickly so there's going to be more
information coming out within weeks and
I think what people are worried about
people who care about David Paterson are
that this is just going to become sort
of death by a thousand cuts right he'll
be significantly wounded by the end of
that process I'm distracting to the rest
of the business of the state well
absolutely marches the is the month that
they're supposed to be putting together
a budget that doesn't seem to be
happening
here it is cancellation today is not
going to help that so yes
